channel.title: Maker Faire on Gerald
channel.description: Recent content in Maker Faire on Gerald

item.title: 2016 Bay Area Maker Faire - Dreamscape
item.description: Involvement Dreamland's lamp poles were reconfigured with edison bulbs, and two were wirelessly connected to create an physically disjoint set of social furniture benches that allowed participants to interact with the other benches lights. Links Flux Foundation Github
